Row.Text: Carthaginian Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Cothon and Dockyard in the same District. +2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.

Carthaginian Unique Production Building. +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Coast, Navigable Rivers, and Wonders. Ageless. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on Coast.[n]Carthaginian Unique Building.

Carthaginian Unique Gold Building. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for Resources, Districts, and Wonders. Ageless. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on Coast.[n]Carthaginian Unique Building.

+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes cannot be [icon:Action_Pillage] Plundered. All [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City that are adjacent to Coast and eligible for Walls receive a Wall. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.

[icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes cannot be [icon:Action_Pillage] Plundered. All [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City that are adjacent to Coast and eligible for Walls receive a Wall.[N]Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
There are to be seen at this day certain ruins of the city walls.
